SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountsView
The AccountsView class inherits from BaseView and is a view interface used to display account-related information.
AddCardDialog
A custom dialog window used for adding details of a new card.
AddTransactionDialog
A custom dialog window used for adding new transaction details.
AppConstants
Constants class that stores global styles and configuration information for the application, such as colors and fonts.
BaiduAIService
The service class used to invoke the Baidu Wenxin Yiyan API.
BaseView
BaseView is an abstract class that extends JPanel and serves as the base class for all views in the application.
BucksBrainAIChatView
BucksBrainAIChatView is a view class implementing an intelligent assistant chat interface.
CreditCardsView
The CreditCardsView class extends BaseView and provides a view interface for displaying credit card-related information.
CurrencyConverterService
A service class that provides currency conversion functionality.
CurrencySettingViewPanel
A JPanel that provides a user interface for currency conversion settings.
DashboardView
Defines the DashboardView class, which extends BaseView and is used to display the dashboard view.
DataEntryPage
A Swing JFrame providing options for the user to input financial data.
EditTransactionDialog
A dialog for editing transaction information.
FileHandler
Handles file operations for transaction data.
FinanceTrackerUI
 
InvestmentAnalysisService
投资分析服务类，负责生成投资分析报告
InvestmentsView
A view class extending BaseView used to display investment-related information.
LoginPage
Represents the login page of the application.
Main
The main class that launches the application's graphical user interface (GUI).
PrivacySettingsPanel
A JPanel that provides user interface components for configuring privacy settings.
RegistrationPage
Represents the registration page of the application.
RoundedButton
The custom rounded corner button class, inherited from JButton, provides the functions of rounded corner display and changing the background color according to the mouse state.
RoundedPanel
自定义圆角面板类，继承自JPanel，提供圆角显示和自定义背景、边框绘制的功能。
SecurityService
A service class that provides encryption and decryption functionality using AES (Advanced Encryption Standard).
SettingsView
SettingsView extends BaseView to create the settings interface.
Transaction
Represents a financial transaction in the system.
TransactionController
Controller class for managing transaction operations.
TransactionDataService
A service class that manages financial transaction data and provides analysis functionality.
TransactionManager
A singleton service class that manages financial transactions and implements the Observer pattern for transaction updates.
TransactionManager.TransactionListener
Interface for transaction event listeners.
TransactionsView
The TransactionsView class extends BaseView to display the transactions view interface.
UserDataStorage
Handles user data storage and authentication operations.
